name: redis
description: Redis MCP server for cache and session management

tools.name: get_key
tools.description: Get the value of a Redis key

tools.name: set_key
tools.description: Set a Redis key with optional TTL

tools.name: delete_key
tools.description: Delete one or more Redis keys

tools.name: get_key_ttl
tools.description: Get the remaining TTL of a key

tools.name: expire_key
tools.description: Set expiration time for a key

tools.name: get_hash
tools.description: Get all fields and values from a Redis hash

tools.name: set_hash_field
tools.description: Set a field in a Redis hash

tools.name: list_sessions
tools.description: List all session keys in Redis

tools.name: clear_cache
tools.description: Clear all cache entries or entries matching a pattern

tools.name: get_redis_info
tools.description: Get Redis server info and statistics
